mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_msg( mm_msg_id, mm_emp_id, mm_msg_type, mm_msg_title, mm_msg_content, mm_msg_picurl, dateline,is_del, is_top, top_num, provinceid, cityid, countryid, mm_msg_video,is_check) VALUES ( #{mm_msg_id}, #{mm_emp_id}, #{mm_msg_type}, #{mm_msg_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mm_msg_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mm_msg_picurl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateline}, #{is_del}, #{is_top}, #{top_num}, #{provinceid}, #{cityid}, #{countryid}, #{mm_msg_video, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_check, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, (SELECT mm_level_num FROM mm_level ll WHERE m.mm_level_id = ll.mm_level_id ) as mm_level_num FROM ( SELECT sn.* ,larea.area as area,lemp.mm_emp_mobile as mm_emp_mobile, lemp.mm_emp_nickname as mm_emp_nickname, lemp.mm_emp_type as mm_emp_type,lemp.mm_emp_cover as mm_emp_cover, lemp.mm_emp_company_type as mm_emp_company_type , lemp.mm_emp_company as mm_emp_company, lemp.mm_level_id as mm_level_id, lemp.is_chengxin as is_chengxin , lemp.is_miaomu as is_miaomu,lemp.lat_company as lat, lemp.lng_company as lng from mm_msg sn LEFT JOIN mm_emp lemp ON sn.mm_emp_id=lemp.mm_emp_id LEFT JOIN hat_area larea ON sn.countryid=larea.areaID WHERE sn.mm_msg_id = #{id} ) m
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_msg SET is_del=1 WHERE mm_msg_id=#{mm_msg_id}
UPDATE mm_msg SET is_top = #{is_top}, is_check = #{is_check}, top_num = #{top_num}, mm_msg_type = #{mm_msg_type}, mm_msg_content = #{mm_msg_content} WHERE mm_msg_id=#{mm_msg_id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, (SELECT mm_level_num FROM mm_level ll WHERE m.mm_level_id = ll.mm_level_id ) as mm_level_num FROM ( SELECT sn.* ,larea.area as area,lcity.city as cityName,lemp.mm_emp_mobile as mm_emp_mobile, lemp.mm_emp_nickname as mm_emp_nickname, lemp.mm_emp_type as mm_emp_type,lemp.mm_emp_cover as mm_emp_cover, lemp.mm_emp_company_type as mm_emp_company_type , lemp.mm_emp_company as mm_emp_company, lemp.mm_level_id as mm_level_id, lemp.is_chengxin as is_chengxin , lemp.is_miaomu as is_miaomu from mm_msg sn LEFT JOIN mm_emp lemp ON sn.mm_emp_id=lemp.mm_emp_id LEFT JOIN hat_area larea ON sn.countryid=larea.areaID LEFT JOIN hat_city lcity ON sn.cityid=lcity.cityid WHERE sn.is_del = 0 AND sn.is_top = 1 ) m ORDER BY m.top_num DESC limit #{index},#{size}
